tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    surgical_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_history (
    surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    surgery_type VARCHAR(50),
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(100),
    surgery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_history (
    surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    surgery_date DATE,
    surgery_type VARCHAR(50),
    surgeon_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  blood_type VARCHAR(5)
);

CREATE TABLE surgical_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  surgery_date DATE,
  surgery_type VARCHAR(50),
  surgeon_name VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_type VARCHAR(50),
  notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Surgeries (
  surgery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  surgery_type VARCHAR(50),
  date_performed DATE,
  surgeon_name VARCHAR(100),
  patient_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SurgicalHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  surgery_id INT,
  date_performed DATE,
  outcome TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY(surgery_id) REFERENCES Surgeries(surgery_id)
);
